item.title: 西班牙电信将 2026 年股息减半，转而关注增长
item.description: 西班牙电信公司（Telefónica SA）董事长马克-穆特拉（Marc Murtra）将把 2026 年的股息削减一半，因为这家西班牙收入最高的电信运营商将推出一项新战略，以促进增长。【原文：Telefónica SA will slash its 2026 dividend by half as the company’s Chairman Marc Murtra rolls out a new strategy to fuel growth at Spain’s largest telecom operator by revenue.】

item.title: 全球股市震荡，富时 100 指数有望下跌
任天堂现在预计到 3 月将售出 1,900 万台 Switch 2
item.description: 任天堂公司周二上调了 Switch 2 的销售预期，增强了人们对这款创纪录的游戏机将保持强劲开局的信心。【原文：Nintendo Co. raised its Switch 2 sales forecast on Tuesday, bolstering confidence that the record-breaking console will sustain its strong start.】

item.title: 南苏丹任命五年来第八位财政部长
item.description: 南苏丹总统任命了新的财政部长，这是他在过去五年中第八次更换这个产油国的财政部长。【原文：South Sudan’s president appointed a new finance minister, the eighth time he’s replaced the head of the oil-producing nation’s Treasury in the past five years.】

item.title: 葡萄牙游客众多。现在它需要数据中心
item.description:
在该国寻求为 21 世纪重新调整经济之际，围绕锡内斯镇的投资总额几乎占到国内生产总值的 5%。【原文：

Investment around the town of Sines totals almost 5% of GDP as the country seeks to retool its economy for the 21st century.

】

item.title: UBP 是最新一家在沙特阿拉伯设立办事处的私人银行
item.description: Union Bancaire Privee UBP SA 在沙特阿拉伯开设了办事处，与其他私人银行一道在世界财富管理热点地区之一开展业务。【原文：Union Bancaire Privee UBP SA opened an office in Saudi Arabia, joining other private banks in building a presence in one of the world’s hotspots for wealth management.】

item.title: 尽管减税，外国投资者仍减持印度消费类股票
item.description: 在截至 9 月份的三个月里，外国投资者减持了印度消费类股票，即使消费税减税政策的启动有助于拉动消费。【原文：Foreign investors reduced holdings of Indian consumer stocks in the three months through September, even as a consumption tax cut kicked in to help drive spending.】

item.title: 华尔街首席执行官警告市场将因估值过高而回落
item.description: 华尔街的首席执行官们表示，投资者应做好准备，在未来 12 到 24 个月内，股市将缩水 10%以上，而这种调整可能是一种积极的发展。【原文：Wall Street chief executives said investors should brace for an equity market drawdown of more than 10% in the next 12 to 24 months, and that such a correction can be a positive development.】

item.title: 日元创 8 个月新低后日本片山就外汇问题发出警告
item.description: 日本财务大臣片山聪树（Satsuki Katayama）再次就货币走势发出口头警告，重申了强烈的紧迫感，因为市场对政府干预的风险越来越警觉。【原文：Japanese Finance Minister Satsuki Katayama issued another set of verbal warnings on currency movements, reiterating a strong sense of urgency, as the markets grow more alert to the risk of government intervention down the line.】

item.title: 阿美石油公司利润超出预期，显示压力有所缓解
item.description: 沙特阿美石油公司（Saudi Aramco）第三季度利润出人意料地增长，原因是产量的提高有助于减轻原油价格下跌的影响，并帮助这家石油巨头打破了长达数年的盈利连续下滑的局面。【原文：Saudi Aramco posted a surprise increase in third-quarter profit as a production boost helped mitigate the impact of lower crude prices and helped the oil giant break a yearslong streak of falling earnings.】

item.title: 国泰君安首席执行官称特朗普移民政策 "反增长
item.description: 全球最大的资产管理公司之一的首席执行官将唐纳德-特朗普总统的移民政策称为 "反增长"，因为美国政府正在推进史无前例的打击行动，这在外国技术工人中引发了混乱。【原文：The chief of one of the world’s largest asset managers labeled President Donald Trump’s immigration policy “anti-growth,” as the US administration pushes ahead with an unprecedented crackdown, spurring chaos among skilled foreign workers.】

item.title: 人工智能金融科技公司 Optasia 在南非上市后着眼于亚洲扩张
item.description: 人工智能金融科技公司 Optasia 集团周二在约翰内斯堡证券交易所上市，市值将接近 14 亿美元，该公司正寻求在非洲、亚洲和拉丁美洲扩张。【原文：AI-powered fintech firm Optasia Group is eying expansion in Africa, Asia and Latin America following a Johannesburg Stock Exchange listing on Tuesday that will value it close to $1.4 billion.】

item.title: 最高法院将在贸易问题上做出有趣的权衡
item.description:
预测市场认为，法院不会对特朗普征收的关税盖橡皮图章。【原文：

Prediction markets think the court won’t rubber-stamp the tariffs as Trump imposed them.

】

item.title: SK 海力士涨幅高达 240% 促使韩国交易所警告投资者
item.description: SK Hynix 公司的股价今年以来上涨了 240%，引发了交易所对投资者的异常警告，这可能是该公司股价过热的一个迹象。【原文：A 240% rally in SK Hynix Inc.’s shares this year has sparked an unusual exchange caution to investors, in a possible sign that the shares may be overheated.】

item.title: 新世界、万科债务动向撼动中国房地产业
item.description: 新世界发展股份有限公司（New World Development Co.【原文：New World Development Co. and China Vanke Co., two of the most closely watched distressed Chinese property names, are again forcing investors to reckon with the fallout from the country’s real estate crisis.】

item.title: 印度央行再次干预，印度卢比从接近历史低点回升
item.description: 在印度储备银行可能采取干预措施后，卢比大幅上涨，从接近历史最低点回落。【原文：The rupee gained sharply, pulling back from a near-record low after likely interventions by the Reserve Bank of India.】

item.title: 手术成像公司 Ultragreen.ai 开始评估对新加坡 IPO 的兴趣
item.description: 用于手术成像的荧光技术供应商 UltraGreen.ai 已开始评估投资者对其在新加坡首次公开募股的兴趣。【原文：UltraGreen.ai, a provider of fluorescence technology used in surgical imaging, has started gauging investor interest for its initial public offering in Singapore.】

item.title: 通胀忧虑再起 澳洲央行维持关键利率不变
item.description: 澳大利亚央行在一项广受关注的决定中维持了关键利率不变，警告称经济中的通胀压力加大，并重申未来的行动将以最新数据为指导。【原文：Australia’s central bank held its key interest rate steady in a widely anticipated decision, warning of stronger inflationary pressures in the economy and re-affirming that future moves will be guided by incoming data.】

item.title: 库存减少，锌徘徊在近一年来最高点附近
item.description: 由于全球库存持续下降，伦敦金属交易所的锌收盘价接近 2024 年 12 月以来的最高点。【原文：Zinc held near its highest close since December 2024 on the London Metal Exchange as global inventories continued to fall.】

item.title: 日本高市力争明年夏季完成增长计划的编制工作
item.description: 日本首相高市真奈表示，她将在明年夏天之前制定出新的国家增长战略，同时承诺在不提高税率的情况下增加税收。【原文：Japanese Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi said she will put together the nation’s new growth strategy by next summer, while pledging to boost tax revenues without increasing taxation rates.】

item.title: LG 化学与中国石化合作生产钠离子电池材料
item.description: 韩国 LG 化学有限公司和中国石化集团正在合作开发钠离子电池材料，钠离子电池被誉为最有前途的下一代储能技术之一。【原文：South Korea’s LG Chem Ltd. and China’s Sinopec Group are partnering to develop materials for sodium-ion batteries, which have been touted as one of the most promising next-generation technologies for energy storage.】

item.title: 瑞银主席警告瑞士失去优势，保险面临系统性风险
item.description: 瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）主席抨击瑞士本土市场作为财富管理中心的光辉正在被香港和新加坡所取代，同时还对美国保险业迫在眉睫的风险发出警告。【原文：UBS Group AG’s chairman blasted his home market of Switzerland as losing its luster as a wealth management hub to Hong Kong and Singapore, while also warning against looming risks in the US insurance industry.】

item.title: 全球人工智能泡沫破灭可能有助于资金流入印度股市
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 大和银行盈利超预期，并购交易激增
item.description: 大和证券集团（Daiwa Securities Group Inc.【原文：Daiwa Securities Group Inc.’s profit beat estimates last quarter, as dealmaking in mergers and acquisitions surged while retail clients traded more.】

item.title: 马来西亚捍卫美国贸易协议，主权担忧与日俱增
item.description: 马来西亚总理安瓦尔-易卜拉欣（Anwar Ibrahim）因与美国达成贸易协议而面临批评，马来西亚表示其主权仍然受到保护，不受美国制裁的约束。【原文：Malaysia said its sovereignty remains protected and it isn’t bound by sanctions imposed by US, as Prime Minister Anwar Ibrahim faces criticism for a trade deal with the superpower.】

item.title: 韩国总统李明博在首次预算报告中将人工智能置于中心位置
item.description: 韩国总统李在明将人工智能作为其政府经济愿景的核心，承诺通过积极的人工智能投资和政策支持来改造国家的工业、公共服务和国防。【原文：South Korean President Lee Jae Myung placed artificial intelligence at the heart of his administration’s economic vision, pledging to transform the country’s industries, public services and defense through aggressive AI investment and policy support.】

item.title: 博裕为收购星巴克中国寻求约 14 亿美元贷款
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，私募股权公司博裕资本（Boyu Capital）正在与银行洽谈，以获得约 14 亿美元的贷款，支持其收购星巴克中国业务的多数股权。【原文：Private equity firm Boyu Capital is in talks with banks for a loan of around $1.4 billion-equivalent to support its acquisition of a majority stake in Starbucks Corp.’s China business, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 日元逼近 155 日元，高盛认为没有立即干预的风险
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc）认为日本近期进行货币干预的风险不大，称即使日元汇率接近 1 美元兑 155 日元，"尚未达到 "通常的触发点。【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. sees little immediate risk of currency intervention in Japan, saying the usual triggers “have not yet been met” even as the yen approaches 155 per dollar.】

item.title: 印度顶级经纪商 Groww 承接 7.47 亿美元 IPO 订单
item.description: 印度最大的在线经纪商 Groww 的母公司将于周二开始接受投资者的首次公开募股订单，募集资金可能达到 663 亿卢比（约合 7.47 亿美元），这将帮助印度炙手可热的首次公开募股市场接近去年的纪录。【原文：The parent of Groww, India’s largest online broker, will start taking investor orders Tuesday for an initial public offering that may fetch 66.3 billion rupees ($747 million), helping the country’s hot IPO market approach last year’s record.】

item.title: 电动飞机制造商贝塔技术公司首次公开募股融资 10 亿美元
item.description: 电动飞机制造商贝塔科技公司（Beta Technologies Inc.【原文：Beta Technologies Inc., an electric-powered aircraft manufacturer, raised $1.02 billion in an upsized initial public offering, pricing above the marketed range despite turbulence created by the US government shutdown.】
